channel.title: Would this be possible?
channel.description: Would it be possible to make Gold Trimmed Saradomin armor, just like the Wise Old Man's?

item.title: Would this be possible?
item.dc:creator: @int int
item.description:
@int wrote:

That won’t trim it… The farthest we got is just placing it with an actual Item that is already trimmed.

Read full topic

item.title: Would this be possible?
item.dc:creator: @dragonkid575 dragonkid575
item.description:
@dragonkid575 wrote:

I dropped that command into the client.java, compiled and got this

client.java:32056: ';' expected find.itemid("4402,4405,4412,4879") //goldtrim ^ client.java:32058: <identifier> expected edit.(id.item) && ^ client.java:32060: class expected int.skillindex. //goldtrim ^ client.java:32060: <identifier> expected int.skillindex. //goldtrim ^ client.java:32058: not a statement edit.(id.item) && ^ client.java:32064: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 6 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Would this be possible?
item.dc:creator: @alilime0 alilime0
item.description:
@alilime0 wrote:

heres a command on how to make saradomin armour trimmed if you have it in your inventory:

[code] if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“saragoldtrim”) && playerRights >=0)

     {

find.itemid(“4402,4405,4412,4879”) //goldtrim

edit.(id.item) &&

int.skillindex. //goldtrim

{

}

[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 03:28:26 PM[/size][hr]sry for dbbl post, i never tried this before my best friend told me this

Read full topic
